mapper.select: select g.group_id, g.group_name from mug_group g where g.group_id in (select distinct m.group_id from mug_group_member m where m.person_id = #{personId})
select g.*, r.region_name_abbr region from mug_group g left join tb_region r on g.group_region = r.region_code limit 100
select *, r.region_name_abbr region from mug_group g left join tb_region r on g.group_region = r.region_code where instr(g.group_name, #{search}) > 0 or instr(g.group_alias, #{search}) > 0
